description: Combined realm export for API Management Platform - two separate realms for internal and partner identity management

security_notes.client_secrets: Default client secrets are used for development only. MUST be changed in production.

password_policies.internal: Minimum 8 characters with mixed case, digits
password_policies.partners: Minimum 12 characters with mixed case, digits, special characters

security_notes.brute_force_protection: Enabled on both realms with 30 failure attempts tolerance
